mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE(RECIPESEQ, MEMBERID, RECIPETITLE, RECIPECONTENT, RECIPEBIGCATEGORY, RECIPESMALLCATEGORY, RECIPEVIDEOURL, RECIPEGOODSTAG, RECIPEPRICE, RECIPERATING) VALUES(NEXTVAL('RECIPESEQ'), #{memberId}, #{recipeTitle}, #{recipe_content}, #{recipeBigCategory}, #{recipeSmallCategory}, #{recipeVideoUrl}, #{recipeGoodsTag}, #{recipePrice}, 0.0)
mapper.select: SELECT RECIPESEQ, MEMBERID, RECIPETITLE, RECIPECONTENT, RECIPEBIGCATEGORY, RECIPESMALLCATEGORY, RECIPEVIDEOURL, RECIPEGOODSTAG, RECIPEPRICE, RECIPERATING FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPESEQ=#{recipeSeq}
SELECT * FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPEBIGCATEGORY=#{category} ORDER BY RECIPERATING DESC LIMIT 3
